Class TabHeaders

The TabHeaders component contains the Tab items and controls scroll functionality if content has overflow.

Hierarchy

  • TabHeaders

Implements

  • AfterContentInit
  • OnChanges

cacheActive

@Input()
cacheActive: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:121

Set to 'true' to have Tab items cached and not reloaded on tab switching. Duplicate from n-tabs to support standalone headers

The index of the first visible tab.

followFocus

@Input()
followFocus: boolean
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:125

Set to 'true' to have tabs automatically activated and have their content displayed when they receive focus.

headerContainer

@ViewChild({"selector":"tabList","opts":"{ static: true }"})
headerContainer: any
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:148

Gets the Unordered List element that holds the Tab headings from the view DOM.

skeleton

@Input()
skeleton: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:129

Set to true to put tabs in a loading state.
